text.headline: CISCO Packet Software Developer
text.text:
• Packet Tracing: Conducted in-depth packet tracing to analyze network performance.
  • Web Development: Contributed to web-based tools development.
  • Real-world Implementation: Improved network security and application efficiency.

text.headline: Google Cloud Platform Analyzer
text.text:
• Cloud Deployment: Deployed and managed scalable applications on GCP.
  • Automation: Developed scripts to streamline operations.
  • Collaboration: Worked with cross-functional teams to improve outcomes.

text.headline: Channel Pro Front/Backend Developer
text.text:
• Full Stack Development: Worked on backend (Django) and frontend (WordPress).
  • Python Integration: Developed scripts for task automation.
  • Maintenance: Regularly updated the company website.

text.headline: Prutor IITK Python Developer
text.text:
• Backend Development: Developed and optimized backend systems for an online bookstore.
  • API Management: Ensured smooth operation and integration of APIs.
  • Performance Enhancement: Improved efficiency and reliability.
